remarks.para: May be inoperative provided EICAS message APU GEN OFF is verified to be operative.

placard.para: Placard APU Generator OFF Light "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

numlitem.para: Start the APU, then select APU generator ON. Observe APU GEN OFF EICAS message is extinguished.
Select APU GEN OFF and observe APU GEN OFF EICAS message is displayed.
Select APU GEN ON and observe APU GEN OFF EICAS message is extinguished.
